treatment-md.title: Normanellidae Kihara & Huys, 2009, gen. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Contributions to the taxonomy of the Normanellidae (Copepoda, Harpacticoida): description of a new genus from the Brazilian continental shelf and re-assignment of Pseudocletodes vararensis Scott & Scott, 1893 (ex Nannopodidae)
